## Setup and load data

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))

lipidomics <- read_csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
```

## Basic statistics

### Replaced by function

```{r basic-stats, include=FALSE}
lipidomics %>%
  group_by(metabolite) %>%
  summarise(across(value, list(mean = mean, sd = sd))) %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ round(.x, digits = 1)))
```

```{r plot-metabolites}
metabolite_distribution_plot <- 
    ggplot(lipidomics, 
           aes(x = value)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")

metabolite_distribution_plot
```
